mapper.select: SELECT a.customer_remark AS "customerRemark", a.customer_remark_pic AS "customerRemarkPic", a.order_remark AS "orderRemark", a.order_remark_pic AS "orderRemarkPic", a.business_name AS "businessName", a.business_phone AS "businessPhone", a.business_remark AS "businessRemark", a.business_remark_pic AS "businessRemarkPic", a.shop_name AS "shopName", a.shop_phone AS "shopPhone", a.shop_addr AS "shopAddr", a.shop_remark AS "shopRemark", a.shop_remark_pic AS "shopRemarkPic" FROM order_info a WHERE a.id = #{orderId} AND a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}

SELECT a.id AS id, a.tech_id AS techId, b.name AS techName, b.head_pic AS headPic, b.sex AS techSex, b.phone AS techPhone FROM order_dispatch a LEFT JOIN tech_info b ON a.tech_id = b.id WHERE a.order_id = #{orderId} AND a.status = 'yes' AND a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
